name: Overcast (aachen)
description:
A simple sokoban game.

Move using the arrow keys. Get your little vampire back home.

Permalink: https://aachen.itch.io/overcast

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Background music: Leaving - Ikson

Success sound effect by All Sounds

Can't move sound by All Sounds

Moving sound by All Sounds

Reset button sound by CCHub

Sliding blocks sound by Sound Effects

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As part of Mediocre Productions' release for GDS2 assignment 4.
